game.s_dis: Time Shooter 3: SWAT is a first-person shooter where time moves only when you move. As a SWAT operative, eliminate terrorists, rescue hostages, and use strategy to survive in slow-motion combat.
game.l_dis:
Play Time Shooter 3: SWAT Online – Slow-Motion FPS Action

Time Shooter 3: SWAT is an innovative first-person shooter where time only progresses when you move. This unique mechanic lets you plan every move carefully, dodge bullets, and take out enemies with precision. As a member of an elite SWAT team, your goal is to neutralize armed terrorists and rescue hostages across intense missions.

What is Time Shooter 3: SWAT?

Time Shooter 3: SWAT is a strategic FPS inspired by the gameplay of SuperHot. Every motion, step, and attack affects time — giving you the power to pause the battlefield and think tactically. Choose your weapons wisely, aim accurately, and execute each mission flawlessly.

How to Play Time Shooter 3: SWAT

  • Use Time to Your Advantage: Time moves only when you move, giving you full control of every situation.
  • Eliminate Terrorists: Take out armed enemies before they can shoot you.
  • Rescue Hostages: Complete each mission objective safely.
  • Choose Weapons: Use guns, melee weapons, or improvised tools to take down targets.
  • Plan Your Moves: Every step counts — act fast but think faster.

Why Play Time Shooter 3: SWAT Online?

Play Time Shooter 3: SWAT unblocked directly in your browser and experience an intense slow-motion FPS challenge. Perfect for fans of tactical shooters and time-based gameplay.

Key Features

  • Time Control Mechanic: Time only moves when you do.
  • Strategic FPS Gameplay: Plan attacks and react in real time.
  • Multiple Weapons: Use pistols, rifles, and melee weapons.
  • Challenging Levels: Each mission offers new threats and environments.
  • Free Online Play: No downloads required – play instantly.

Become the Ultimate SWAT Operative!

Play Time Shooter 3: SWAT online now and test your reflexes, tactics, and timing in this thrilling slow-motion first-person shooter.
